items.summary: In `backend/main.mo`, implement correct canister upgrade lifecycle plumbing (`system func preupgrade` / `system func postupgrade`) to persist the wallet-domain stable state across upgrades and route it through `Migration.run(...)` during upgrade, while keeping all existing public APIs (RBAC, user profile, organization, Stripe, and all existing method signatures) backward-compatible.

Add/ensure `backend/migration.mo` exists and exports a stable `run(...)` entrypoint that accepts the pre-upgrade wallet-domain state (wallets, walletTransactions, walletEvents) and returns the post-migration wallet-domain state in a forward-compatible structure suitable for subsequent Activity 2 organization-scoping steps.
